definition: dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: In the Golan Heights, an estimated 80, 000 Syrians fled.
sentences.chinese: 在戈蘭高地，大約有八十萬敘利亞人背景離鄉。

sentences.english: Writers Erich Origen and Gan Golan created the comic book.
sentences.chinese: 作家埃裏希奧利和甘戈蘭高地建立的漫畫書。

sentences.english: A road near the Syrian-Israeli border in the GolanHeights.
sentences.chinese: 在戈蘭高地上敘利亞和以色列邊境的一條公路。
